Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 20.04.4 & Fedora (might work on other versions, too)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Some imagination at least
  • Additional Notes: Permanent & stable internet connection required. Steamdeck currently not supported.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 20.04.4 & Fedora (might work on other versions, too)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or similar
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: One that is able to play sounds
  • Additional Notes: Permanent & stable high speed internet connection. Steamdeck currently not supported.

results.name: Hokuto no Ken : Raoh Gaiden - Ten no Haou

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz, AMD Athlon 64 X2 2GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 or AMD RADEON RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or AMD RADEON RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: SSD and headphones are recommended.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and 18.04
  • Processor: x64 with SSE2 support
  • Memory: 350 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: x64 with SSE2 support
  • Memory: 350 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller may not be supported.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15+
  • Processor: x64 with SSE2 support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller Support is limited to Official XBox One Controllers in Wireless mode.
